response.original_title: しほの涼 スクール水着 Annual
response.overview: First time seeing "Shihono Ryo" on Blu-ray!! The top-selling teenage idol who made an explosive debut is back by popular demand! This is the ultimate "school swimsuit" collection—the definitive compilation and your last chance to see her in this iconic look!!  Featuring a staggering 9 different types of school swimsuits, this work is packed with scenes of her licking lollipops, showering, and playing in the pool, including plenty of "wet look" shots. Her slender, bony-but-beautiful curves are the perfect match for a swimsuit ☆ For fans of Ryo-chan, this is a commemorative masterpiece so good you'll cry with joy!
response.title: しほの涼 スクール水着 Annual
